description.gold-silver:
Whips up a tornado
to attack.
description.crystal:
Whips up a tornado
to attack.
description.ruby-sapphire:
Whips up a vicious twister
to tear at the foe.
description.emerald:
Whips up a vicious twister
to tear at the foe.
description.firered-leafgreen:
A vicious twister
attacks the foe.
It may make the
foe flinch.
description.diamond-pearl:
The user whips up a
vicious twister to
tear at the foe.
It may also make the
foe flinch.
description.platinum:
The user whips up a
vicious twister to
tear at the foe.
It may also make the
foe flinch.
description.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user whips up a
vicious tornado to
tear at the foe.
It may also make the
foe flinch.
description.black-white:
The user whips up a vicious tornado
to tear at the opposing team.
It may also make targets flinch.
description.black-2-white-2:
The user whips up a vicious tornado
to tear at the opposing team.
It may also make targets flinch.
description.x-y:
The user whips up a vicious tornado
to tear at the opposing Pokémon.
This may also make them flinch.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
The user whips up a vicious tornado
to tear at the opposing Pokémon.
This may also make them flinch.
description.sun-moon:
The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at the
opposing Pokémon. This may also make them flinch.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at the
opposing Pokémon. This may also make them flinch.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at the
opposing Pokémon. This may also make them flinch.
description.sword-shield:
The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at opposing
Pokémon. This may also make them flinch.

effect.full:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to make each target flinch.

If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
effect.shortEffect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
